full_summary:
**Notification of Tender**

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) - System Administrators - Level 2. This opportunity is part of the larger RFPS for the provision of mid-level IT services, which will be used to support DFATD's IT operations across Canada and globally.

**Key Requirements**

* Provision of IM/IT support services to 170+ mission locations worldwide
* Collaboration with colleagues to provide 24/7 incident management and request fulfillment
* Experience with remote work environments and Microsoft Teams
* Candidates with french language proficiency are preferred

The selected vendors will be required to provide up to 22 full-time resources within a two-week timeframe of contract award. All resources must be available to work from any DFATD location within Canada.

**Business Operations**

* Collaborate with SIS National IT Support Team (SISN) in the NCR
* Provide IM/IT support for 10,000+ users

**Contract Award**

* Vendors will be awarded up to three contracts
* Evaluation criteria: combined score based on technical merit and price

**Sanctions and Subsidy Laws**

* Respondents must confirm compliance with trade agreements, including Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Must attest to not being involved with child soldiers

**Submission and Evaluation**

* Closing date: 2023-04-03 @ 2:00 PM EDT
* Proposal must include all requested documents and be in English and French

The Government wishes to inform all potential respondents that the evaluation criteria, tender evaluation committee, and contract award process will ensure fairness and transparency. All respondents must respect any deadlines, procedures and rules established. Respondents are also required to confirm the accuracy of the information provided in their proposal.
